text: Fast Track Mahila Court Judge J. Flora here on Friday sentenced a youth who was accused of cheating a girl to undergo one-year rigorous imprisonment. According to prosecution, P. Ananda Kumar (23) of Kumaresan Nagar, Kazhugumalai, had maintained relationship with a 19-year-old girl of Velayuthapuram and promised to marry her. But after having sexual intimacy with the girl, he deserted her. The Kazhugumalai police registered a case against him on October 25, 2009. A fine of Rs.3,000 was slapped on him.
title: Man gets jail for cheating girl
